TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolboxService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService, class System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService
Public MustInherit Class ToolboxService Implements IComponentDiscoveryService, IToolboxService
public ref class ToolboxService abstract : System::ComponentModel::Design::IComponentDiscoveryService, System::Drawing::Design::IToolboxService
type ToolboxService = class interface IToolboxService interface IComponentDiscoveryService

summary.span: 提供 接口的默认实现。

span.span: Provides a default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是分部实现接口。The class is a partial implementation of the interface. 若要使用此实现必须从此类派生并实现抽象方法。To use this implementation you must derive from this class and implement the abstract methods. 实现后，可能会将此类添加到设计器应用程序的服务容器。Once implemented, you may add this class to your designer application's service container. 应该有一个工具箱服务的每个设计器的应用程序。There should be one toolbox service for each designer application. 提供许多复杂逻辑，创建工具箱服务，但是需要定义类别和项的存储容器。 provides much of the complex logic of creating a toolbox service, but requires that you define the storage containers for categories and items. 这样简单的工具箱，也可以非常复杂。This allows for simple toolboxes or very complex ones.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

summary.span: 获取描述可用工具箱类别的字符串的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of strings depicting available categories of the toolbox.
A collection of category names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别名称对应于不同的工具箱类别。The category names correspond to various toolbox categories. 如果工具箱不实现任何形式的类别，属性可能会返回一个空集合。If a toolbox does not implement any form of categories, the property may return an empty collection.

summary.span: 从工具箱项或保存的数据对象创建一个新的工具箱项容器。

span.span: Creates a new toolbox item container from a toolbox item or a saved data object.

summary.span: 从保存的数据对象创建一个新的工具箱项容器。

span.span: Creates a new toolbox item container from a saved data object.

returns.span: 新的工具箱项容器。

span.span: A new toolbox item container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够提供的派生的版本。The method gives you the opportunity to provide a derived version of a . 默认情况下类不支持链接的项，因此它将返回`null`不是链接参数`null`。By default, the class does not support linked items, so it returns `null` for link parameters that are not `null`. 若要提供链接支持，应重写此方法以创建派生，它能够处理的链接。To provide link support, you should override this method to create a derived that is capable of handling links. 传入的数据对象应包含从调用之前获得的数据上工具箱项容器的属性。The data object passed in should contain data obtained from a prior call to the property on a toolbox item container.

span.span: is .

para.span: 链接的工具箱项是其存在性绑定到特定的设计器宿主的存储。

span.span: A linked toolbox item is one whose existence is tied to the storage of a particular designer host.

para.span: 因此，在典型的项目系统中，设计器宿主是与特定文件相关联。

span.span: So, in a typical project system, a designer host is associated with a particular file.

para.span: 从工具箱将自动删除链接到设计器宿主的工具箱项时设计器宿主的源代码文件被删除或从项目中删除。

span.span: A toolbox item linked to a designer host would automatically be deleted from the toolbox when the designer host’s source file is deleted or removed from the project.

para.span: 链接的工具箱项可以使可能的方案，例如，禁用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]工具箱项时在 Windows 窗体设计器处于打开状态。

span.span: Linked toolbox items make possible scenarios such as disabling the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] toolbox items when the Windows Forms designer is open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够提供的派生的版本。The method gives you the opportunity to provide a derived version of a . 默认情况下类不支持链接的项，因此它将返回`null`不是链接参数`null`。By default, the class does not support linked items, so it returns `null` for link parameters that are not `null`. 若要提供链接支持，应重写此方法以创建派生，它能够处理的链接。To provide link support, you should override this method to create a derived that is capable of handling links. 如果所提供分配链接参数，则表明这是一个链接的工具箱项。If the provided link parameter is assigned, it indicates that this is a linked toolbox item.

span.span: is .

para.span: 链接的工具箱项是其存在性绑定到特定的设计器宿主的存储。

span.span: A linked toolbox item is one whose existence is tied to the storage of a particular designer host.

para.span: 因此，在典型的项目系统中，设计器宿主是与特定文件相关联。

span.span: So, in a typical project system, a designer host is associated with a particular file.

para.span: 从工具箱将自动删除链接到设计器宿主的工具箱项时设计器宿主的源代码文件被删除或从项目中删除。

span.span: A toolbox item linked to a designer host would automatically be deleted from the toolbox when the designer host’s source file is deleted or removed from the project.

para.span: 链接的工具箱项可以使可能的方案，例如，禁用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]工具箱项时在 Windows 窗体设计器处于打开状态。

span.span: Linked toolbox items make possible scenarios such as disabling the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] toolbox items when the Windows Forms designer is open.

summary.span: 当工具箱服务检测到活动设计器的工具箱项筛选器已更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the toolbox service detects that the active designer’s toolbox item filter has changed.

summary.span: 返回包含工具箱中所有项的 。

span.span: Returns an containing all items on the toolbox.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列表中的项必须是对象。The items in the list must be objects. 如果工具箱实现按类别进行组织，这将检索所有类别的合并的列表。If the toolbox implementation is organized in categories, this retrieves a combined list of all categories. 列表必须是读/写，因为可能会向其添加新项。The list must be read/write, as new items may be added to it. 当工具箱服务添加新项时，它将首先调用方法，然后添加新项从返回方法。When the toolbox service adds a new item, it first calls the method and then adds the new item to the returned from the method. 如果提供类别名称，则返回该类别中的项。If a category name is provided, only the items in that category should be returned. 如果指定无类别，则应返回所有项。If no category is specified, all items should be returned.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: an
param.span: 加载程序集时使用的程序集名称。

span.span: An assembly name from which to load an assembly.

summary.span: 返回给定程序集的 对象的 。

span.span: Returns an of objects for the given assembly.

returns.span: 一个集合，包含以给定的程序集名称表示的程序集中的所有工具箱项。

span.span: A collection containing all the toolbox items in the assembly represented by the given assembly name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法扫描所有类型的支持工具箱项，并返回这些类型的项的程序集。The method scans the assembly for all types that support toolbox items, and return items for those types. 若要支持的工具箱项，类型必须具有以下特征：To support a toolbox item, a type must have the following characteristics: - 是公共的。Be public. - 实现 。Implement . - 不是抽象的。Not be abstract. - 不具有设置为`false`在其类型。Not have a set to `false` on its type. - 不包含泛型参数。Not contain generic parameters. 程序集处于锁定状态的持续时间的过程中，因此枚举通过各种文件可能会导致很多要加载的程序集。Assemblies are locked for the duration of a process, so enumerating various files through can cause many assemblies to be loaded. 方法采用程序集名称创建一个单独来搜索程序集。The methods that take an assembly name create a separate to search assemblies. 完成之后枚举对象的一组程序集，可以调用方法，卸载并释放上加载的程序集文件引用。When you are finished enumerating objects for a set of assemblies, you can call the method, which unloads the and frees the file references on the loaded assemblies. 以这种方式加载的程序集被加载到一个单独使它们更高版本成为被卸载。Assemblies loaded in this manner are loaded into a separate so they can later be unloaded. 这只是暂时锁定程序集文件。This only momentarily locks the assembly file.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据对象可以直接表示项容器，或者可能注册用于处理该数据对象中包含的格式的自定义工具箱创建者。The data object may directly represent an item container, or there may be a custom toolbox creator that is registered to handle the format contained within the data object. 如果`host`参数是有效的设计器宿主，方法搜索与设计器宿主关联的工具箱项创建者。If the `host` parameter is a valid designer host, the method searches toolbox item creators that are associated with the designer host. 如果`host`是提供，也比较与主机相关联的工具箱项创建者。If `host` is supplied, toolbox item creators that are associated with the host are also compared.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 刷新工具箱项的状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the toolbox items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时用户已请求应刷新的项的集合，工具箱服务调用方法。The method is called by the toolbox service when a user has requested that the collection of items should be refreshed. 如果集合始终是最新，则无需提供任何实现。If the collection is always current, there is no need to provide any implementation here. 如果从集合返回表示一个快照的工具箱项，但是，此方法提供机会来进行更新。If the collection returned from represents a snapshot of the toolbox items, however, this method provides an opportunity to update them.

summary.span: 当用户报告已使用了选定的工具箱项时，接收来自工具箱服务的调用。

span.span: Receives a call from the toolbox service when a user reports that a selected toolbox item has been used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户报告已使用选定的工具箱项时，工具箱服务调用方法。The method is called by the toolbox service when a user reports that the selected toolbox item has been used. 调用工具箱项后, 很常见的用户界面 (UI) 行为，以取消该工具箱项的选择。After invoking a toolbox item, it is a common user interface (UI) behavior to cancel the selection of that toolbox item. 此方法的默认实现通过将选定的项容器设置为取消的工具箱项选择`null`。The default implementation of this method cancels the selection of the toolbox item by setting the selected item container to `null`.

summary.span: 将当前应用程序的光标设置为表示当前选定工具的光标。

span.span: Sets the current application's cursor to a cursor that represents the currently selected tool.

returns.span: 如果已选定了某一项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if there is an item selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱服务提供了支持设置用户界面 (UI) 光标表示当前选定的工具箱项的图像。The toolbox service provides support for setting the user interface (UI) cursor to an image that represents the currently selected toolbox item. 可以调用方法以设置游标。The method can be called to set the cursor. 它将返回`true`如果光标设置，或`false`如果不是。It returns `true` if the cursor is set, or `false` if it is not. 默认实现将光标设置为十字线并返回`true`如果没有选择项。The default implementation sets the cursor to a crosshair and returns `true` if there is an item selected. 它将返回`false`此游标，如果未不选择任何项保持不变。It returns `false` and leaves the cursor unchanged if no item is selected.
